recipesJson.name: Touched by light
recipesJson.author: Chrisdvr1
recipesJson.description: Stated this picture for 10 minutes waiting for inspiration. Wanted to do a red and green cream I was thinking Strawberry lime but the limitations really affected my ability to use lime. So it turned into a strawberry cream with a kiss of lemon.

reviews.text: This was a test for me to see if I can taste FA Red Touch. Answer is, I can't. What I get is a very biscuit-y lemon meringue pie. Simple, not bad, totally missing the point for me, and that's on me. It's a bit harsh in taste though, I think it needs to settle a bit longer than 3 days. Or it's the back effect of the strawberry for me. Anyway, not my thing at all.
